thread.section_title: AllGifts.ie Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of AllGifts.ie | allgifts.ie
thread.title: Patricia

author: Patricia
title: Patricia
text: I love AllGifts as they give you the opportunities to purchase Goods and Services in many different places and in many different categories. They have an AllGift directory which you can browse from and it is so easy when you have an AllGift card. You can purchase online along with going to shops and using your AllGift card. I think it is great. It is also a nice gift to give to anyone as they can purchase what they like aswell.
